Hello.

I'm Sopheak, a senior Salesforce developer and an engineering graduate from Institute of Technology of Cambodia. I love tech and creating stuff!

What do I do?

View full experiences and skills on LinkedIn • Download Resume

Aug 2019 - Present Senior Salesforce Developer

Working on a global CRM system, implementing various features and projects including custom customer support solutions such as Knowledg Base, Case and Contact handling Salesforce Service Cloud apps, moderation systems, and full-fledged Salesforce Communities for eBay Classifieds Group, a world leader in classifieds. Service Cloud Google Analytics Visualforce Salesforce Community APEX SOQL Lightning Component Framework (Aura, LWC)

Feb 2019 - May 2019 PHP and Blockchain Developer internship

Built an ERP system based on Dolibarr platform, developed a Corda Blockchain network for storing financial transactions, and integrated the two systems by creating REST API interfaces on a Spring Boot server. Dolibarr PHP mySQL Corda Kotlin Spring Boot REST API

Jul 2018 - Oct 2018 iOS Developer internship

Developed financial book libary application with interactive educational book/audiobook reading and listening experience, full offline support, audience engagement measuring, and more. iOS Swift

Feb 2017 - Nov 2017 Microsoft Student Partner program member

Knowledge sharing experience with developers and computer majors and a training course by a Certified Microsoft Trainer. Developed online shopping Android application, and a backend server with a SQL database and API interfaces based on Microsoft SQL Server. Microsoft Server Management Studio REST API C# Android Java

Jul 2017 - 2017 Android Developer internship

Developed online shopping and student attendance management applications. Android Java
